trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供的控件数组<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The `CheckBoxArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `CheckBox` array.
trans-unit.target: `CheckBoxArray`类提供了等效的运行时功能的 Visual Basic 6.0`CheckBox`数组。

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: 它不提供的 Visual Basic 6.0 控件数组的设计时功能。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接的工具从到 Visual Basic 6.0 升级[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象重复可在其他命名空间中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型显著区别它们是所必需[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]实现。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 当实例化<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray>，你还必须调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.SetIndex%2A>方法创建的初始元素数组中。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.SetIndex%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> in a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>中<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray"></xref>单击。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler.
trans-unit.target: `Click`事件传递<xref:System.EventArgs>到其事件处理程序。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 因此它仅指示发生了单击操作。

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 （按钮、 单击、 鼠标轮旋转或位置的数），使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>如果单击引起操作不是鼠标，如按 ENTER 键操作，将不会引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以设置它认为是双击而不是两次单击鼠标按钮点击之间的时间。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: `Click`双击控件每次引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a [control](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有事件处理程序`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>的事件[控件](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm)、`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>时控件是双击和调用这两种方法将引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the `Click` event might be raised two times.
trans-unit.target: 如果双击控件时，控件不支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件，`Click`可能引发事件两次。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: `Enter` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: `Enter` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.

trans-unit.source: By using the `GiveFeedback` event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> `KeyPress` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> The `KeyPress` event is not raised by noncharacter keys; however, the noncharacter keys do raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> events.
trans-unit.target: 键事件按下列顺序发生︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> `KeyPress` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>`KeyPress`非字符键不会引发事件; 但是，不要引发非字符键<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes.

trans-unit.source: To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件而不使控件能够接收键盘事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>中窗体的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>到事件处理方法`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 在控件应重新定位其子控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: `Layout`事件发生时添加或删除时的边界的控件更改，以及在出现的其他更改可能会影响控件的布局子控件。

trans-unit.source: The layout event can be suppressed by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 布局事件，可以通过使用抑制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change.
trans-unit.target: 挂起的布局，可在控件上执行多个操作，而无需执行一次布局针对每项更改。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你调整大小，并将控件移动，每个操作都会引发`Layout`事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），或通过调用更改焦点<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>方法，焦点事件按下列顺序发生︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>当更改焦点，通过使用鼠标或调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>方法，焦点事件按下列顺序发生︰<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>`Leave`有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。 </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 用鼠标单击控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> `MouseClick` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event instead of the second `MouseClick` event.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针位于形状通常时，单击鼠标按钮将引发以下一系列的控件中的事件︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> `MouseClick` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>两次单击关闭发生的时间非常具体由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定将生成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>而不是第二个事件`MouseClick`事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件是逻辑上控件的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 它们通常由其他操作，如按 ENTER 键在控件有焦点时引发。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针停放在控件上时发生。

trans-unit.source: A typical use of `MouseHover` is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: 一个典型用途`MouseHover`是当鼠标悬停在控件 （"悬停矩形"） 周围的指定区域中控件上时显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 引发此事件所需的暂停指定以毫秒为单位通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `MouseHover` event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.

trans-unit.source: The `QueryContinueDrag` event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: `QueryContinueDrag`拖放操作期间键盘或鼠标按钮状态更改时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The `QueryContinueDrag` event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: `QueryContinueDrag`事件允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 当调整控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the <xref:System.EventArgs> data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get it's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: 若要确定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>的调整大小的控件，可以强制转换`sender`参数<xref:System.EventArgs>数据到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>并对其进行的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>属性 (或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>属性单独)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.EventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Layout> event instead of the `Resize` event.
trans-unit.target: 若要处理自定义布局，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Layout>事件而不是`Resize`事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Layout> event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Layout>在响应中引发事件`Resize`事件，但还会在响应其他影响控件的布局更改。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Layout>

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Leave> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Leave> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Validating> `Validated` If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Validating> and `Validated` events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>更改焦点或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>方法，或通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>属性设置为当前窗体，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件︰ <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Leave><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>通过使用鼠标或通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>方法更改焦点时，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件︰<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Leave><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Validating>`Validated`如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`false`<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Validating>和`Validated`事件将被抑制。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Validating> event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Validating> event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>设置为`true`中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Validating>事件委托中，通常会发生后的所有事件<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Validating>事件将被抑制。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.CheckBoxArray.Validating> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>
